original_text: Azbuk's son, Nehemiah, worked on another part of the wall. He was ruler of part of the region of Beth Zur. He repaired the wall along to the place of the royal graves. He continued to work as far as the pool that people had built and the House of the Brave Soldiers.
korean_text: 그 다음은 벧술 지방 절반을 다스리는 아스북의 아들 느헤미야가 중수하여 다윗의 묘실과 마주 대한 곳에 이르고 또 파서 만든 못을 지나 용사의 집까지 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: worked on another part of the wall
He was ruler of part of the region of Beth Zur
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 벧술 지역의 일부를 다스리는 통치자였다

sentences.original_text: to the place of the royal graves
He continued to work as far as the pool
and the House of the Brave Soldiers
